metadata.name: Mekamon #4
metadata.description:
A new take on a crest, Japanese Mon, Western Coats of arms or flags.

Mekamon is your unique symbol for the Metaverse.

They are created using plane geometric shapes and these first four are based on a triangle, circle, rectangle and square.

Holders will get different versions to use in different spaces and platforms, coloured, animated, 3D, the possibilities are endless.
